src_original: paramārthādhigamaśca upeyabhūta iti /  anyathā tasya deśayitumaśakyatvāt /  nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /  sarvā hi buddhiḥ ālambananirālambanatayā vikalpasvabhāvā,  vikalpaśca sarva eva avidyāsvabhāvaḥ,
